query.value: InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_counter('node_disk_read_time_seconds_total') | extend device = tostring(Labels.device) | extend hostname = tostring(Labels.hostName) | extend DeltaTimeRead = DeltaTimeSeconds | extend DeltaReadTime = DeltaVal | join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_counter('node_disk_reads_completed_total') | extend device = tostring(Labels.device) | extend hostname = tostring(Labels.hostName) | extend DeltaTimeTotal = DeltaTimeSeconds | extend DeltaReadTotal = DeltaVal) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, hostname, device | summarize AvgReadTimeRate = sum(DeltaReadTime) / sum(DeltaTimeRead), AvgReadTotalRate = sum(DeltaReadTotal) / sum(DeltaTimeTotal) by Computer, Origin, AgentId, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, hostname, device | where AvgReadTotalRate > 0 | extend Latency = AvgReadTimeRate / AvgReadTotalRate
